title: Config
description: Configuration options for the bot that do not need to be private

prefix.description: The command prefix for the bot, such as '!'

enableSetup.description: Whether the 'setup' command should be allowed to run or not

ticketColours.description: The embed colours to use on mentor help tickets

new.description: The colour to show on an unclaimed ticket

old.description: The colour to show on a claimed ticket

channelFile.description: The path to the server channel config json file

dbFile.description: The path to the id database json file

roleFile.description: The path to the server role config json file

wordlistFile.description: The path to the banned word list json file
